title: From Root to Tip: Ayurvedic Protocols for Hair Growth
author: Harish
excerpt: Consistent rituals—oiling, massage, and patience—are the heart of Ayurvedic hair growth. Learn how bhringraj and castor oil support hair health.
content:
The Ayurvedic Approach to Hair Health

Ayurveda treats hair as an expression of ojas and tissue nourishment. Regular oiling, scalp massage, balanced diet, and herbs like bhringraj and amla form the backbone of hair care practices.

Why Bhringraj & Castor?

  • Bhringraj: Traditional tonic for root strength and hair vitality.
  • Castor Oil: Thick, nourishing oil that seals moisture and supports scalp health.
  • Amla: Antioxidant-rich support for follicles and shine.

How to Use Nightly Serums Effectively

  1. Apply a few drops to the scalp and massage gently for 5–10 minutes.
  2. Leave overnight or at least a few hours before washing.
  3. Repeat 2–3 times weekly initially, adjusting per scalp response.

Patience & Complementary Habits

Hair cycles take time. Expect to evaluate results over 3–6 months. Support serums with a diet rich in protein, healthy fats, and iron, plus stress management and gentle hair handling.
